PATIENT_ID: TEST_STROKE_001
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-01-15 08:00:00

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-01-17 02:00:00
Patient developed acute ischemic stroke during hospitalization.
New left-sided hemiparesis and aphasia noted.
NIHSS score 14. Neurology consulted emergently.

[IMAGING] 2026-01-17 02:30:00
CT head: Acute cerebral infarction in right MCA territory.
MRI brain confirms acute infarct involving right middle cerebral artery.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-01-17 03:00:00
Neurology consult confirms acute stroke.
Neurologist evaluated patient and confirmed diagnosis.
Facial droop and hemiplegia on left side.
